RecordOperationSpec.Name: Do Nothing Record Operation
RecordOperationSpec.Description: Do nothing and quit. Used as a placeholder on the Page Refresh Demo
RecordOperationSpec.Author: Styons Software

SPOperationImplementation.c:CreateProcedureSQL: CREATE PROCEDURE USR_USP_RECORDOPERATION_DONOTHING ( @ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,@CHANGEAGENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) AS BEGIN RETURN 0 END
